content: अपसव्य, --सव्यक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not on the left, right; अपसव्येन हस्तेन <ls>Ms. 3. 214.</ls> {@--2@} Contrary, opposite. --व्यं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} To the right, making the sacred thread hang down towards the left part of the body over the right shoulder (<ab>opp.</ab> सव्यं when it hangs over the left); a position of the thread in Śrāddha or other religious ceremonies at particular times of those ceremonies (the three positions being सव्य, निवीत & अपसव्य) <ls>Ms. 3. 279</ls>; °व्यं कृ to go round one so as to keep the right side towards him; to make the sacred thread hang over the right shoulder.
